title: DOOM Shadow Drops on Switch, PS4, Xbox - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.26.19
description:
Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames.

Tim and Greg get you up to speed on Doom, Doom II, and Doom 3 coming to your favorite consoles!

Time Stamps - 
00:02:23 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
Today, we’re brought to you by Brooklinen and Experian, but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:03:55 - DOOM Drop!
00:11:20 - Corsair Acquires Origin
00:15:18 - One Less Reason to Hate the Epic Store
00:16:33 - Discord Adding Folders
00:17:50 - Out today
00:20:24 -  Experian
00:21:50 - Brooklinen
Reader mail   -
00:29:22 - “Do you think Masters is the right way to go when bringing Pokemon to mobile?” - Ignacio Rojas
00:35:54 - “I recently tried out PS Now and it turns out it's great!” - Fendyy
00:42:18 - “What do you guys think of Astral Chain?” - Brian Scollo
00:45:45 - “Now I love me some Darksiders…” - The Nano Biologist
00:53:12 - “Do you think PaladinAmber’s way of calling toxic people out is an effective way to stop that behavior?” - BJ Bernardo
00:59:49 - Squad Up: Parker Begale - thebeagal8 - PS4 & Xbox One
01:00:50 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Greg & Tim
Tuesday: Greg & Andrea
Wednesday: Greg & Whitta
Thursday: Greg & Andrea
Friday: Greg & Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
